'''Magic: The Gathering | The Hobbit''' is an expansion for the [[Magic: The Gathering]] collectible card game, set to be released August 2026 under the '''Magic: The Gathering Universes Beyond''' sub-brand. It was [https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/everything-announced-for-magic-the-gathering-in-2026#TheHobbit announced at MagicCon Atlanta 2025] and will be the second Lord of the Rings themed expansion for the card game, the first being [[The Lord of the Rings: Tales of Middle-earth]], initially released on June 20, 2023.
